meanings.sent1: The liveried doorman greeted guests at the hotel entrance.

meanings.sent3: The liveried waiter spilled soup on his uniform, creating a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: The liveried guards stood like statues at the palace gates.
meanings.sent5: The liveried staff added a touch of elegance to the event.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a specific uniform or livery
meanings.sent1: The liveried employees of the company wore matching outfits.
meanings.sent2: The liveried team members represented their school at the competition.
meanings.sent3: The liveried dancers moved gracefully in their colorful costumes.
meanings.sent4: The liveried athletes proudly displayed their team colors.
meanings.sent5: The liveried group marched in unison during the ceremony.
